attributes.name: Throttle (Twist or Thumb)
attributes.description:
Thumb lever or twist throttle for your Swytch eBike. Simply slides onto standard size handlebars. 

Compatible with all Swytch Kits.  Once installed, you have power at the press of a lever (or a twist). Just press the thumb lever and unlock power – the further you press the more power you get.

FAQ: does it work with a pedal sensor?  Yes absolutely, you can use a throttle and pedal sensor at the same time. The motor will activate when you pedal, or when you twist.

FAQ: Is it road legal?  Since 2016 throttles are not legal on electric bikes on the road – this is available for off-road use only.

attributes.name: Throttle (thumb or twist)
attributes.description:
Thumb lever or twist throttle for your Swytch eBike. Simply slides onto standard size handlebars. 

Compatible with all Swytch Kits.  Once installed, you have power at the press of a lever (or a twist). Just press the thumb lever and unlock power – the further you press the more power you get.

FAQ: does it work with a pedal sensor?  Yes absolutely, you can use a throttle and pedal sensor at the same time. The motor will activate when you pedal, or when you twist.

FAQ: Is it road legal?  Since 2016 throttles are not legal in the EU on electric bikes on the road – this is available for off-road use only. Otherwise check your local laws. 

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Brompton PRO Kit - 50km range
attributes.description: Turn your Brompton into an eBike with 50km range and 250W power. The Swytch PRO Brompton kit is a complete electric bike conversion kit specially designed for Brompton, and includes battery and charger.

attributes.name: Spare charger - 2A
attributes.description:
Handy to have a spare at the office?

2A means 3 to 4hr charge time.

Available with EU, US, UK or AUS plug type. Charger barrel connector compatible with all Swytch kits, as well as most other 36V electric bike batteries.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Torque Arm (Universal or Brompton)
attributes.description:
A bit of extra strength. Recommended for very fine, light or carbon forks.

Choose the type to match your kit, Universal or Brompton.

Torque arm info

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Motor extension cables
attributes.description:
Do you have an unusually long distance between your handlebars and your front fork?

The standard length of our motor cables is 90cm (this covers 99% of bikes).  If the distance between your front hub and where your powerpack will be fitted is more than that, you will need extension cables.

Extension cables add an extra 1.5m.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Brake sensors (x2)
attributes.description:
Recommended for use with throttle accessory - cuts the power when you brake.

Also handy if you often find yourself in slow moving traffic.

Available in two versions - Inline Cable Brake sensors (for most bikes) or Hydraulic Brake Sensors for bikes with Hydraulic Disc Brakes.

In the photos: 

Version with blue connectors is inline sensors, simple feed your brake cable through them. 

Version with red connectors is the hydraulic sensors, stick the sensor to your brake lever housing, and stick the magnet to the brake lever metal. When you pull the brake lever it pulls the magnet away from the sensor, triggering the motor cut-out.

Both versions are compatible with the Swytch kit

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Hydraulic brake sensors (x2)
attributes.description:
Recommended for use with throttle accessory - cuts the power when you brake.

Also handy if you often find yourself in slow moving traffic.  Allows you to pedal a tiny bit without engaging the motor.

attributes.name: Brompton Luggage block adaptor (included with Brompton PRO and TOUR kits)
attributes.description:
Allows powerpack to be fitted to the luggage mount on your Brompton.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Regular bike or folding bike (not Brompton)
attributes.description:
We supply a few different types of pedal sensor, it all depends on how your crank connects to your bike. The crank is the arm between your pedal and your bike.

Look at the left crank (not the chain side), where it connects to your bike.  Now click on the pictures next to this text - which is your type?

Are you in the US?  For the coin examples use 2 x Nickels.

attributes.name: Mixed colour motor wheel
attributes.description:
Do you want to mix it up?

If you require a mixture of black and silver on your motor wheel we can do it, but it needs to be custom made just for you.

attributes.name: Fast charger - 3A
attributes.description:
Reduce your charge time to just 1.5 hours (ECO kit) or 2 hours (PRO kit) with our 3A Fast Charger.

Please note - usage with the ECO kit will result in a small (10%) reduction in battery lifetime from 1,000 cycles to 900 cycles. With the PRO kit there will be no noticeable change to the battery lifetime of 1,000 cycles.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Swytch T-Shirt
attributes.description:
Join our team! All you need to do is buy a Swytch t-shirt and you can drop by our offices any time you like.  Oh and whilst you're at it can you make us all a cup of tea? (Only kidding).

Unisex design to suit men or women, four sizes available.

  • Quality fabric with 95% cotton
  • Super soft touch
  • Easy Wash
  • Fast Drying
  • Easy Iron

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Rear Bicycle Light: Premium USB Re-Chargeable Battery, 100 Lumens
attributes.description:
USB charging rear light to complement the in-built Swytch front light

Premium quality 100 Lumen Light, which comes with a full 1-year warranty

Specifications:

  • Rubber stretch mount to fit anywhere on your bike, with plastic clip and lock mechanism to take on and off.
  • 100 Lumens Brightness Level
  • USB micro charge port.
  • Internal rechargeable lithium polymer battery (3.7V 300mAh).
  • Approx 20 hours runtime on full power, 100+ hours on flash.
  • Auto-off after 1 hour.

(All USD prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Brompton bike (made by Brompton)
attributes.description:
Is this kit for a Brompton?

If so please tell us which type of pedals you have.

Type A - 2013 onwards

Type B - Made before 2013

The year your Brompton was made is shown by the first 2 numbers of the serial number on the back of your bike.

attributes.name: One more thing - Check the gap for your pedal sensor
attributes.description:
After confirming your kit and wheel size, you will need to confirm which type of bottom bracket you have.  This will help us decide which type of pedal sensor to send you.

Answer the first question, then look at the picture that appears to decide which type you need.

attributes.name: Sticker pack: Premium Vinyl Metal Adhesive Transfers for Bicycles
attributes.description:
Make your ride really pop with our Swytch sticker pack!

The pack consist of minimum 6x premium vinyl metal transfers designed specifically for bicycles. With a variety of fun designs and slogans.

Sticking to your bike is easy - and the transfer is long lasting and fully weather proof.

For every 100x sticker packs we sell, we will pass the bulk quantity cost savings back to you and add extra free stickers. 

Complete this survey to vote for and suggest ideas for the new stickers - we will announce the extra free stickers we are adding as we go. The more of you guys that want it the more you all get, and the more opportunities to suggest and vote for a custom sticker design!

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Premium 20 Pcs Bicycle Toolkit
attributes.description:
Be prepared for anything with our fantastic Swytch toolkit which has absoutely every tool you'll even need for maintaining your bicycle. All made to professional grade quality - great for casual and professional use.

Choose this option to add it to your existing order with no additional shipping charge.

The 20 Pcs set comes in a professional hard-case and includes:

  • 3x Tyre Levers
  • 5 Part Tube repair kit
  • 3x Multi-Spanners
  • 1x Chain Whip
  • 1x Chain Braker/Maker
  • 1x Pedal Arm Remover
  • 1x Bottom Bracket Remover
  • 1x Allen Key Set
  • 1x Long Arm Allen Key (for pedal arm caps)
  • 1x Spoke Multi-Wrench

We would thoroughly recommend getting yourself a toolkit like this to take good care of your Swytch Bike. In particular the Spoke Wrench, Multi Wrenches, Multi Allen Keys, Tube Repair kit and Tyre Levers are the most commonly used items when taking good care of your bike.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Boxing Day Sale!  buy any additional kit now for a great price!
attributes.description:
Due to the fantastic number of contributions to our campaign we have been able to fully fund our production run and achieve good economies of scale.  This means that any additional kits added to this batch will cost us less, so we can offer them to you for less!

From as low as $375!


(All prices exclude local taxes and duties)

attributes.name: Extra kit?
attributes.description: Choose from any of our kits - order now and we can add it to our big production run to give you the very best deal!

attributes.name: Universal PRO Kit (wheel survey upgrade)
attributes.description: Turn any bike into an eBike with 50Km range and 250W power.  The Swytch PRO kit is a complete electric bike conversion kit including battery and charger.

attributes.name: Extra Kit Offer - Boxing Day sale!
attributes.description:
Extra kits ordered now through our Survey Process cost us much less to produce and deliver, and we have decided to pass all of these savings on to you.

These savings include: Platform fees, Transaction fees, Advertising costs, Shipping and handling economies of scale, and not to mention the economies of scale we get for every additional order we add to our Massive One-Off Indiegogo production run.

attributes.name: Swytch Kit Accessories
attributes.description:
Want extra upgrades for your Swytch kit? You can add them now

Perhaps a fast charger to reduce the charge time to 2 hours.

Or brake sensors to give instant motor cut-out when you brake (these are fully optional, if you don't install brake sensors, the motor still cuts out when you stop pedalling).

All accessories below are available for one time only with a 50% discount on the RRP, and no extra shipping charge, if you add to your order now.

attributes.name: Cycling Gear and Accessories
attributes.description: Want some cool cycling gear on the cheap? Add any of the items below to your order at a rock bottom price and zero extra shipping cost, and we will deliver it along with your kit.

attributes.name: Black Friday Deal: ECO Kit 55% OFF
attributes.description:
Get an extra kit at our lowest ever price, just $375 (55% off).

Comes with a free Bike Sticker Pack and Gift Card delivered before Christmas, if you are buying it as a gift for someone, so they can pimp their bike this XMas ready for the kit to arrive in March.

Due to the fantastic number of contributions to our campaign we have been able to fully fund our production run and achieve good economies of scale.  This means that any additional kits added to this batch will cost us less, so we can offer them to you for less.

Also - we are launching our Order Confirmation survey on Black Friday so it would just be rude if we didn't offer all you lovely backers and extra special discount on buying extra kits.

This offer is not public and the only way to take advantage of it is by adding this item to your CrowdOx order confirmation now. So if you have friends or family that want to take advantage of it, the best way to do so is to place the order on their behalf now for them - and if you need to have it shipped to a different address, we can adjust this for you at a later date. 

(Please note, All prices exclude local taxes and duties, which will be charged before delivery based on your local country tax and duty rates)

attributes.name: Sticker Pack FOR CHRISTMAS
attributes.description:
Make your ride really pop with our Swytch sticker pack!

Choose this option for delivery in time for Christmas (shipping charges apply to cover shipping from our stock in the UK)

The pack consist of minimum 6x premium vinyl metal transfers designed specifically for bicycles. With a variety of fun designs and slogans.

Sticking to your bike is easy - and the transfer is long lasting and fully weather proof.

For every 100x sticker packs we sell, we will pass the bulk quantity cost savings back to you and add extra free stickers. 

Complete this survey to vote for and suggest ideas for the new stickers - we will announce the extra free stickers we are adding as we go. The more of you guys that want it the more you all get, and the more opportunities to suggest and vote for a custom sticker design!

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Premium 20 Pcs Bicycle Toolkit FOR CHRISTMAS
attributes.description:
Be prepared for anything with our fantastic Swytch toolkit which has absoutely every tool you'll even need for maintaining your bicycle. 

Choose this option for separate delivery by Christmas (shipping charges apply to cover shipping from our UK stock)

The 20 Pcs set comes in a professional hard-case and includes:

  • 3x Tyre Levers
  • 5 Part Tube repair kit
  • 3x Multi-Spanners
  • 1x Chain Whip
  • 1x Chain Braker/Maker
  • 1x Pedal Arm Remover
  • 1x Bottom Bracket Remover
  • 1x Allen Key Set
  • 1x Long Arm Allen Key (for pedal arm caps)
  • 1x Spoke Multi-Wrench

We would thoroughly recommend getting yourself a toolkit like this to take good care of your Swytch Bike. In particular the Spoke Wrench, Multi Wrenches, Multi Allen Keys, Tube Repair kit and Tyre Levers are the most commonly used items when taking good care of your bike.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: ECO Power Pack
attributes.description:
Complete Power Pack 35km Range 250W lithium-ion battery, backwards compatible with the original Swytch Kit.  Add-on for extra range, does not include motor wheel, pedal sensor, charger or connector.

(All prices exclude local taxes and duties).

attributes.name: Motor only
attributes.description: Only the motor - for the makers out there!

attributes.name: Universal PRO Kit ordered from Swytch website
attributes.description: Turn any bike into an eBike with 50Km range and 250W power.  The Swytch PRO kit is a complete electric bike conversion kit including battery and charger.

attributes.name: Brompton ECO Kit - ws
attributes.description:
Would you like a bit more range?  Why not upgrade to the PRO kit (50km).

Or a lot more range? How about the TOUR kit (100km)?

Note: PRO and TOUR kits also come with 20mph top speed (where allowed) and the black wheel option.

If you are happy with your original order please select Brompton ECO.

attributes.name: Universal ECO Kit - ws
attributes.description:
Would you like a bit more range?  Why not upgrade to the PRO kit (50km).

Or a lot more range? How about the TOUR kit (100km)?
